TopicTitle: I Spy With My Kerbal Eye

Articles.Content:
**I Spy With My Kerbal Eye....**

**General rules:**

**1. Stay on topic**

**2. The Game rules consist of taking screenshot and posting it and see if the other people find the object. Make sure to reply with a quote.**

**3. How to get it right: edit the image and sketch an arrow pointing to where you think it is**

**Example:**

![YrgJmxZ.png](http://i.imgur.com/YrgJmxZ.png)

**I spy with my Kerbal Eye..... Duna!!!!**

**\*Make sure it is possible and visible\* Duna is there btw.** 

**#FoundIt**

![AtpcDDT.png](http://i.imgur.com/AtpcDDT.png)

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)**Have fun!!!**![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Oh, jeez louise. This is gonna suck for people with small screens! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Sounds fun, can't participate at the moment: no editing program and no access to KSP or my screenshots.

Great idea, though! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I spy with my kerbal eye.... Kerbin ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I finally got a screenshot of me reentering kerbin's SOI and so I now made it into this for this thread.

![kwCPNqT.png](http://i.imgur.com/kwCPNqT.png)

Found it:

> [![ukr2h2Zl.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ukr2h2Zl.jpg)](http://imgur.com/ukr2h2Z)

I spy with my Kerbal eye... the Monolith! I'd call it a spoiler but it's about the easiest Easter egg to find xD

[![4CxiYwl.png](http://i.imgur.com/4CxiYwl.png)](http://imgur.com/4CxiYwl)

Hehe, I already knew where that was in the first place, I was like WA??!? I dont see it, then that little black pixel was seen... A monolith on Val or something would be so.. much hard ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> ![M79xomc.png](http://i.imgur.com/M79xomc.png)
> 
> 

Its so easy but here. I spy with my kerbal eye sneaky Minmus getting in every screenshot of mine...

![ww5r4un.png](http://i.imgur.com/ww5r4un.png)

Easy!

> 
> ![1n8SOEi.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/1n8SOEi.png?1)
> 
> 

![MXEC3CK.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/MXEC3CK.png?1)

EDIT:

It's a rocket.

![dXxuXXk.png](http://i.imgur.com/dXxuXXk.png)

![m6H1olS.png](http://i.imgur.com/m6H1olS.png)

[![0arzLjEm.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/0arzLjEm.jpg)](http://imgur.com/0arzLjE.png) I think it's this, but I'm not sure since I haven't been there in a while and yet again it's barely a pixel.

I spy with my Kerbal eye... a parachute!

[![l0zrsEUl.png](http://i.imgur.com/l0zrsEUl.png)](http://imgur.com/l0zrsEU.png)

P.S.: In response to ghostbuzzer: Sort of. I've found that sending partial data doesn't seem to affect the total amount you earn once the transmission does finish all the way, and if you timewarp the data transmits at the same rate in real-time while the solar panels charge the batteries faster; in the picture I was not doing this xD Long story short, running out of electric charge really just means transmissions will take a bit longer.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-12T18:20:31Z" title="06/12/2015 06:20  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 12, 2015</time> by mythbusters844**

I hope your kerbals will make it out alive. Doesn't look like they are going to have fun on reentry. I seek interest now for the future of these brave but doomed kerbalnauts. As long as you save the science the crew reports don't matter ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
